sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-2 variant="success m-2">建立得獎資料</b-button>
    <b-alert v-model="response.status" variant="success" dismissible>
        操作成功
    </b-alert>
    <b-alert v-model="response.error" variant="danger" dismissible>
        {{ response.feedback }}
    </b-alert>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-2" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">得獎名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editdata.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">詳細內文</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <ckeditor v-model="editdata.content" :config="editorConfig" :editor="editor"></ckeditor>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">排名</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editdata.ranking" placeholder="請填入得獎名次"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">排名樣式</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-select v-model="editdata.ranking_style" :options="options.ranking_styles"></b-form-select>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="1">
                        <label for="">得獎科系</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="3">
                        <b-form-select v-model="editdata.department" :options="options.departments"></b-form-select>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>

                <b-col md="12 text-center">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="createData">創建</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
import { HonorServer } from '../../providers/http-server';
import ClassicEditor from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic';
import MyUploadAdapter from '../../libs/myUploadAdapter';

function MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin(editor) {
    editor.plugins.get('FileRepository').createUploadAdapter = (loader) => new MyUploadAdapter(loader);
}

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
        return {
            options: {
                departments: [
                    { value: 41, text: '應用英文系' },
                    { value: 42, text: '應用日文系' },
                    { value: 43, text: '應用中文系' },
                ],
                ranking_styles: [
                    { value: 0, text: '預設樣式' },
                    { value: 1, text: '第一名(金牌)' },
                    { value: 2, text: '第二名(銀牌)' },
                    { value: 3, text: '第三名(銅牌)' },
                ]
            },
            editdata: {
                title: "",
                content: "",
                ranking: "",
                ranking_style: 0,
                department: 41,
            },
            response: {
                status: false,
                feedback: false,
                error: false,
                code: 200
            },
            editor: ClassicEditor,
            editorConfig: {
                toolbar: {
                },
                extraPlugins: [MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin],
            }
        }
    },
    methods: 
    {
        createData(){
            let data = {
                title: this.editdata.title,
                content: this.editdata.content,
                ranking: this.editdata.ranking,
                ranking_style: this.editdata.ranking_style,
                department: this.editdata.department
            };
            HonorServer.create(data).then( (response) => {
                this.response.status = response.status;
                this.response.error = false;
                this.$router.go(0);
            }).catch(() => {
                this.response.status = true;
                this.response.error = true;
            });
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped></style>
